org.lwjgl.stb

Class STBTTPackRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTPackRange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class STBTTPackRange
extends Struct
    A range of packed character data, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_PackFontRanges(org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTPackContext, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTPackRange.Buffer, int)

    stbtt_pack_range members

    MemberTypeDescription
    font_sizefloat
    first_unicode_codepoint_in_rangeintif non-zero, then the chars are continuous, and this is the first codepoint
    array_of_unicode_codepointsintif non-zero, then this is an array of unicode codepoints
    num_charsint
    chardata_for_rangestbtt_packedchar *output
    *char[2]

    • Constructor Detail

      • STBTTPackRange

        public STBTTPackRange(long struct)
        Creates a STBTTPackRange instance at the specified memory address.

      • STBTTPackRange

        public STBTTPackRange(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a STBTTPackRange instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
